text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump TRUMP CONTINUES TO SHOW WHO HE WORKS FOR

WALL STREET

HE DOESN'T CARE ABOUT THE 130,101 DEAD AMERICANS FROM COVID-19

HE DOESN'T CARE ABOUT THE 23 AMERICANS SOLDIERS KILLED AFTER RUSSIA OFFERED A BOUNTY TO MURDER THEM

TRUMP IS LETTING RUSSIA WIN https://t.co/HvFGpSJghK
